article_title: Humana's Medicare Business Booms But So Do Flu Costs

article_metadata.description: Humana (HUM), which provides Medicare benefits to more than 2.7 million seniors, is taking away market share from rivals, helping the company add more than 377,000 new members last year and another 257,000 in January of this year alone. But the company said its fourth-quarter earnings missed analysts expectations due to [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
